text: Jerry Gibson was a member of the Negro League baseball team the Corapolis Grays, a semi-professional baseball team. He played the position of a pitcher. He played against his brother, Hall of Famer Josh Gibson. On July 17, 1938 he pitched a no-hitter. He also pitched for the Cincinnati Tigers. Transportation may have been a challenge since family members describe him as sometimes roller-skating to games. ==References== Category:Sportspeople from Pennsylvania Category:Cincinnati Tigers (baseball) players Category:Pittsburgh articles needing an infobox Category:Pittsburgh Category:Semi-professional baseball players
